title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Explore the fundamentals of C programming language. Learn syntax, data types, and basic programming concepts. This course offers 3 hours of comprehensive instruction.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Delve into the world of algorithms. Understand sorting, searching, and algorithmic problem-solving. This course provides 4 hours of in-depth learning.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA (Data Structures and Algorithms)
description: Master C++ programming for data structures and algorithms. Learn STL and solve coding challenges. This course delivers 5 hours of intensive instruction.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Get acquainted with essential data structures. Learn about arrays, linked lists, and stacks. This course offers 2 hours of comprehensive training.

title: Introduction to Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python
description: Discover the principles of OOP using Python. Understand classes, objects, and inheritance. This course delivers 3 hours of in-depth learning.

title: Software Engineering
description: Dive into the world of software engineering. Learn best practices in software development and project management. This course provides 6 hours of intensive instruction.

title: AWS (Amazon Web Services)
description: Explore cloud computing with AWS. Learn about EC2, S3, and cloud architecture. This course offers 4 hours of comprehensive training.

title: Cloud Computing
description: Discover the world of cloud computing. Understand cloud services and deployment models. This course provides 3 hours of in-depth learning.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Learn about MySQL databases. Understand database design, SQL queries, and data management. This course offers 5 hours of comprehensive instruction.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills. Learn algorithmic thinking and tackle coding challenges. This course delivers 4 hours of intensive instruction.
